nithiya ha samaya surakima athinda danata wada ihala sapalathawayak wenuwen awashya prathisanskarana nopamawa sidu kirimada athyawashya karyayaki.wisheshayen polis sewaya mula sita aga dakwa purna wenaskamakata lak nokaranne nam yahapath samajayak bihi we yayi bahutharaya thula athi apekshawa upan geyima wala dammata waradak natha.8 samath polis sewayak wenuwata ugath mana lesa puhunuwak lath niladharingen yuth widhimath polis sewayak bihi kara noganne nam thawa duratath siduwanne me majara kramayama wikashanaya wimak pamani.ee athara delaksha panasdahasak pamana wana hamuda samajikathwayada hakiyawa athnam( danatamath kriyathmaka wana paridima ) sanwardhana katayuthu sandaha madihath kara gatha yuthuya.wisheshayen uthuru palatha thula diyath kara athi sanwardhana katayuthu walata thawa thawath ee dayakathwaya yedawiya yuthu athara ehidi hamuda samajikayanta amathara prathilabha labena wadapiliwelakda sakasiya yuthuya.

daruwan kuda wayesdima wiwaha karadima mema wiwaha kramaye di sidu karayi.mema wiwaha bohowita hindu ha maslim anthawadi samajawala siduwe kuda daruwan dedenaku wiwaha karadima wadihiti purushayekuta kuda dariyak wiwahakara dima mema krameydi bohowita siduwe.eksath jathinge manawa himikam pragnyapthinta anuwa lama wiwaha yanu manawa himikam kadakirimaki shariya nithiya pawathina atham islamiya samajayanhi wayasa awurudu 10 adu dariyan wiwahayata sudusu bawata sandahanwe.eyata hethuwa nabithuma thama thunwana birinda wana ayisha wiwaha karaganthe aya wayasa awurudu 06 wa thibiyadiya.atham dakunu aasiyathika ratawala pawa muslim wiwaha nithiya yatathe lama wiwaha nithigathawi pawathi.udaharana lesa shri lankawe samanya wiwaha nithiya udarata wiwaha nithiya ha muslim wiwaha nithiya washayen wiwahaya sambandha nithi paddhathi thunak kriyathmakawe samanya ha udarata wiwaha nithiya anuwa wiwaha apekshakayin dedena aniwaryayenma wayasa awurudu 18 sampurnawi thibiya yuthuya.eheth muslim wiwaha nithiya anuwa wiwahawime awama wayas simawa wanne wayasa awurudu 12 sampurna wimaya.namuth kwasi mandalaye anumathiya laba athi awasthawaka wayasa awurudu 12 adu uwada wiwahaya sidukaragatha haka.hindu anthawadi samajawalada me aakareyan lama wiwaha siduweyi.mewan wiwaha sadaha biya duppathkama samaja pidanaya dariyange aarakshawa pilibada prashna balapayi.arabi ha akunu aasiyathika ratawala lama apayojana ihala matitamaka pawathi.mema sanskruthinthula sthriyakage pathiwruthawa kanyabhawaya wani sankalpa dadiwa pawathi.wiwahayata pera lingika asura wiwahayata pera gab ganima wani kriya dariyakage pawulata dadi awanambuwak genadena karanaweyi.mewan sadhakamatha demapiyan dariyak wadi kalak thama bharaye thaba gannawata wada kata ho wiwaha karadimata pelambaena bawa me samaja pilibada paryeshana sidukala manawa ha samaja widyagnyayan pawasayi.me anuwa gathahoth lama wiwaha sadaha owun polambaawanu labanne owunge sanskruthiya wisini.
